diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts of Literary Criticism.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    LiteraryCriticism[Literary Criticism] --> Theoretical[Theoretical]
    LiteraryCriticism --> Practical[Practical Applied]
    Theoretical --> Evaluation[Evaluation of Theories]
    Theoretical --> Development[Development of New Theories]
    Practical --> Interpretation[Interpretation of Texts]
    Practical --> Analysis[Analysis of Texts]
    Practical --> EvaluationTexts[Evaluation of Texts]
